name: TrueSight Pulse Meter Plugin SDK Python Random
description: Example meter plugin using Meter Plugin SDK for Python

paramSchema.title: Min
paramSchema.name: min
paramSchema.description: Minimum value of the random number

paramSchema.title: Max
paramSchema.name: max
paramSchema.description: Maximum value of the random number

paramSchema.title: Interval (ms)
paramSchema.name: interval
paramSchema.description: How often (in milliseconds) to generate measurement.

paramSchema.title: Source
paramSchema.name: source
paramSchema.description: The Source to display in the legend for the measurement data.
